author: GameSpot
description:
We got hands on with Beta Test II of Arknights: Endfield. This product is currently in beta and may evolve based on user feedback. At launch, English voiceover (VO) will be included.

This is a real-time 3D RPG with strategic elements set in the Arknights universe, combining real-time strategic team combat and immersive world exploration, where players can also “transform” the world through factory building and regional development. Players take on the role of the Endministrator to explore, defend, and expand humanity’s frontier on the planet Talos-II.

#arknights #gamespot
title: 10 Minutes of Arknights Endfield Beta II Preview Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description:
Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare are coming to Netflix, iOS, Android, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2 on December 2.

Experience these epic Western adventures on the latest mobile devices and current generation consoles — with free upgrades, the ability to carry over game progress, and a number of enhancements.

#reddeadredemption #rockstargames #gaming
title: Red Dead Redemption - Netflix, iOS, Android, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2 Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Valve just announced new Steam hardware which is coming early 2026, which includes a new Steam Controller, Steam Machine, and the Steam Frame VR headset. Here's everything to know.

Credits: Tom Caswell, Tamoor Hussain

#steam #valve #gamespot
title: New Steam Hardware Everything To Know So Far
